abilities.name: Fluffy Fur
abilities.effect: If Wigglytuff is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Wigglytuff is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Pester
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.
